title: China’s Chery to open car plant in Vietnam
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Chinese car maker Chery Automobile plans to set up a factory in Vietnam by next year to sell locally produced models in the country rather than import them, online news portal VnExpress reported. “We want to build a factory in

The post China’s Chery to open car plant in Vietnam appeared first on Investvine.
